sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SYSB0100 ( USR_ID , USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM , SYS_DIV_CD , AUTH_ID , USR_RGSTN_SEPT_FLAG , DEPT_CD , USR_NM , USR_DIV_CD , EMAIL , SYSTEMKEY , PHN_NUM , TYP_OCCU_CD , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , AUTH_APPTN_BGNN_DT , AUTH_APPTN_END_DT , USR_EAUE_DT , USR_USE_YN , USR_AUTH_EEPN_YN , PYSP_INSN_YN , NOT_PYSP_INSN_YN , SHTTM_INSN_YN , SERVC_INPT_PRCS_YN , YRTX_INPT_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #usrId# , #usrInfoChngDtntm# , #sysDivCd# , #authId# , #usrRgstnSeptFlag# , #deptCd# , #usrNm# , #usrDivCd# , #email# , #systemkey# , #phnNum# , #typOccuCd# , #pyspGrdeCd# , #dtilOccuInttnCd# , #authApptnBgnnDt# , #authApptnEndDt# , #usrEaueDt# , #usrUseYn# , #usrAuthEepnYn# , #pyspInsnYn# , #notPyspInsnYn# , #shttmInsnYn# , #servcInptPrcsYn# , #yrtxInptPrcsYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SYSB0100 SET USR_ID=#usrId# , USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM=#usrInfoChngDtntm# , SYS_DIV_CD=#sysDivCd# , AUTH_ID=#authId# , USR_RGSTN_SEPT_FLAG=#usrRgstnSeptFlag# , DEPT_CD=#deptCd# , USR_NM=#usrNm# , USR_DIV_CD=#usrDivCd# , EMAIL=#email# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PHN_NUM=#phnNum# , TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd# , PYSP_GRDE_CD=#pyspGrdeCd# , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD=#dtilOccuInttnCd# , AUTH_APPTN_BGNN_DT=#authApptnBgnnDt# , AUTH_APPTN_END_DT=#authApptnEndDt# , USR_EAUE_DT=#usrEaueDt# , USR_USE_YN=#usrUseYn# , USR_AUTH_EEPN_YN=#usrAuthEepnYn# , PYSP_INSN_YN=#pyspInsnYn# , NOT_PYSP_INSN_YN=#notPyspInsnYn# , SHTTM_INSN_YN=#shttmInsnYn# , SERVC_INPT_PRCS_YN=#servcInptPrcsYn# , YRTX_INPT_PRCS_YN=#yrtxInptPrcsYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE USR_ID=#usrId# AND USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM=#usrInfoChngDtntm#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SYSB0100 WHERE USR_ID=#usrId# AND USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM=#usrInfoChngDtntm#
sqlMap.select: SELECT USR_ID , USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM , SYS_DIV_CD , AUTH_ID , USR_RGSTN_SEPT_FLAG , DEPT_CD , USR_NM , USR_DIV_CD , EMAIL , SYSTEMKEY , PHN_NUM , TYP_OCCU_CD , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , AUTH_APPTN_BGNN_DT , AUTH_APPTN_END_DT , USR_EAUE_DT , USR_USE_YN , USR_AUTH_EEPN_YN , PYSP_INSN_YN , NOT_PYSP_INSN_YN , SHTTM_INSN_YN , SERVC_INPT_PRCS_YN , YRTX_INPT_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSB0100 WHERE USR_ID=#usrId# AND USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM=#usrInfoChngDtntm#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT USR_ID , USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM , SYS_DIV_CD , AUTH_ID , USR_RGSTN_SEPT_FLAG , DEPT_CD , USR_NM , USR_DIV_CD , EMAIL , SYSTEMKEY , PHN_NUM , TYP_OCCU_CD , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , AUTH_APPTN_BGNN_DT , AUTH_APPTN_END_DT , USR_EAUE_DT , USR_USE_YN , USR_AUTH_EEPN_YN , PYSP_INSN_YN , NOT_PYSP_INSN_YN , SHTTM_INSN_YN , SERVC_INPT_PRCS_YN , YRTX_INPT_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM SYSB0100 WHERE 1=1
USR_ID = #searchKeyword#
USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY USR_ID DESC , USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM SYSB0100 WHERE 1=1
USR_ID = #searchKeyword#
USR_INFO_CHNG_DTNTM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
